name: Golf Putt Pro
description:
Now you can play some truly polished putts in Golf Putt Pro 3D, a beautiful new version of the #1 game!

Touch Arcade says, "This game is pure arcade action...get it!" Over 1 million people can't be wrong! And now it's free.

Get the number one game in USA, UK, Germany, Japan, Australia, Canada.

The most simple and addictive golf putting game on the iPhone. With five compelling game modes, including a 4-player game, you’ll be putting balls time after time.

People are loving the game...

***** “This game is pure arcade action with an addicting quality that will keep you coming back again and again. It just doesn't get any better than this.”

***** “This is one of my favorite pick up and play games. The simple gameplay was executed perfectly. Fun and Tough.”

***** “It's got that 'one more time' thing going for it that makes it super-addictive! This app will stay on my ipod forever. Get it!!!”

From Neon Play, the makers of the Top 10 app Flick Football.

***AIM OF THE GAME***
It’s very simple, you need to judge the slope of the green and then just tap the ball at the right time to putt the ball. But it’s not as easy as it sounds!

***AWESOME GAME MODES***
THREE LIVES - you have three chances to miss the putt. Consecutive putts give you a multiplier.
IN A ROW - it’s a game of sudden death where you have to putt as many consecutive balls as you can.
PRO - this is for really hard-core players. The golf hole moves to different positions and the arrow moves a bit faster.
SUPER PRO - the hole is in even tricker positions, so judging the line of the putt is even harder!
18 HOLES - a fantastic mode for up to 4 players all competing on the same device. Take it in turns to putt your balls and see who’s the winner!

***LIVE LEADERBOARDS***
With three of the game modes, there are live leaderboards for the top 100 players in the world. Plus you can see how you’re doing compared to your Facebook friends.

***ACHIEVEMENT SYSTEM***
How many of the 25 achievements can you unlock?
